Paragraph: Normalization and responder rates at 6 weeks were 86 % and 69 % respectively .

Chemical entities are substances that have a chemical structure and are composed of atoms or molecules. They can be elements, compounds, or mixtures. In the context of chemistry, chemical entities are typically represented by chemical formulas or structural formulas that show the arrangement of atoms and bonds.
